content: अभिक्रम् {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To step or go near to, approach; तमभिक्रम्य सर्वेऽद्य वयं चार्थामहे वसु <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--2@} To roam over, wander, pass or walk over. {@--3@} To attack, assail, fall upon. {@--4@} To undertake, begin; to set about, prepare; गमनायाभिचक्राम <ls>Rām.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To bring near.
